comments.body: This broken the {verify/update}-generated-deep-copies.sh function as versions is empty pretty much always.  I'm assuming you thought about this with DEFAULT_VERSIONS and VERSIONS below, but you didn't plumb those through...
Agh, lost that in the rebase. Will fix.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +62,66 @@
